attributes.action: reject the proposed 53 question inquisition of all UK travellers immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the Prime Minister to reject the proposed 53 question inquisition of all UK travellers immediately.It will not help on the terrorism issue but WILL cause unnecessary choas,delays and misery at all departure points of the country.Not least,it will prove extremely expensive to administer(more quangoes to oversee the running of the scheme)and will leave an individuals personal details open to abuse by terrorists,hackers and others.This is yet another kneejerk reaction to a problem by this government.
